mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tactical_cases ( id, title, description, scenario_type, forces_composition, tactics_used, outcome, lessons_learned, difficulty_level, tags, created_by, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{scenarioType}, #{forcesComposition}, #{tacticsUsed}, #{outcome}, #{lessonsLearned}, #{difficultyLevel}, #{tags, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.ArrayTypeHandler}, #{createdBy}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tactical_cases ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM tactical_cases WHERE scenario_type = #{scenarioType} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM tactical_cases WHERE difficulty_level = #{difficultyLevel} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tactical_cases SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, scenario_type = #{scenarioType}, forces_composition = #{forcesComposition}, tactics_used = #{tacticsUsed}, outcome = #{outcome}, lessons_learned = #{lessonsLearned}, difficulty_level = #{difficultyLevel}, tags = #{tags, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.ArrayTypeHandler}, created_by = #{createdBy}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
